topic.title: EMS Social History Section - conformance rules

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.22"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10241)/@code="67843-3" EMS Social History Section (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10240)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title and SHOULD equal "EMS Social History" (CONF:10243)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry (CONF:10244)
This entry SHALL conform to Derived Entry template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.24)
This entry SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation (CONF:10246)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10248)/@code="69757-3" Indications of drug or alcohol use by the patient (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10247)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type BL
NEMSIS Trace: EHistory.17, positive, negative, or null values
This entry MAY contain zero or one [0..1] observation
Required if Existence of Drug Use Indicator (10246) is TRUE
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67669-2" Alcohol - drug use (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10250)
This observation SHALL contain at least one [1..*] value with data type CD, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet AlcoholDrugUseIndicator 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.18 STATIC (CONF:10251)
NEMSIS Trace: EHistory.17, proper values
Required if Existence of Drug Use Indicator (10246) is TRUE
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10241)/@code="67843-3" EMS Social History Section (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10240)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title and SHOULD equal "EMS Social History" (CONF:10243)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry (CONF:10244)
This entry SHALL conform to Derived Entry template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.24)
This entry SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation (CONF:10246)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10248)/@code="69757-3" Indications of drug or alcohol use by the patient (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10247)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type BL
NEMSIS Trace: EHistory.17, positive, negative, or null values
This entry MAY contain zero or one [0..1] observation
Required if Existence of Drug Use Indicator (10246) is TRUE
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67669-2" Alcohol - drug use (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10250)
This observation SHALL contain at least one [1..*] value with data type CD, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet AlcoholDrugUseIndicator 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.18 STATIC (CONF:10251)
NEMSIS Trace: EHistory.17, proper values
Required if Existence of Drug Use Indicator (10246) is TRUE
